front.title: American National Standard Specifications for Power Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard is a revision of American National Standard Specifications for Power Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches, ANSI C37.46-1969, to bring it up to date and in line with present requirements for high-voltage fuses and switches.
